translation.LOGIN_GOOGLE: Sign in with your Google account
translation.INITIAL_DATA_SEARCH: Use search bar to find a movie!
translation.NO_DATA_SEARCH: Sorry! We could not find your search...
translation.NO_DATA_HELP: Search by movie name or cast...
translation.RETRY_CONNECTION: Please, review your connections and try again later
translation.ALERT_LOGOUT_TITLE: Are your sure you want to log out?
translation.ALERT_LOGOUT_TEXT: Your account will be deactivated and you will need to Log In again
translation.ALERT_DELETE_TITLE: Are your sure you want to delete your account?
translation.ALERT_DELETE_TEXT: This action can not be reversed and you will lose all your configuration and favorites
